title: Font from Short Film Title
content:
Saw this at the Oscars last night... any clues?

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414235454im_/http:/typophile.com/files/biggerpicture_5406.JPG)
author: jacobrabinowitz

comments.content:
No match unfortunately, some sort of DIN Black. Main earmark is the /G crossbar low position, /B (x-width) may be the result of some customization. More letters [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414235454/http:/static1.squarespace.com/static/52b187e3e4b06f683c1c65e4/t/54b92b79e4b07b4a7d110846/1421421439115/?format=1500w) (/A, /M, /S, /K).  
Alternatives: [Cornelia](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414235454/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/novotypo/nt-cornelia), [Wurz](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414235454/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/tipotype/wurz), [Prismatic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414235454/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/matchandkerosene/prismatic), [Sugo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414235454/http:/www.zetafonts.com/sugo), [Korolev](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414235454/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/device/korolev), [Wilma](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414235454/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typeotones/wilma), [Jean-Luc (Godard)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414235454/http:/www.carvalho-bernau.com/jlg), [Duotone](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414235454/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/matchandkerosene/duotone), [Adhesive Letters](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414235454/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/adhesive-letters), [P.D.U.](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414235454/http:/www.colophon-foundry.org/fonts/pdu), **[Red Top](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414235454/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/studio-k/red-top)**, [Tes](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414235454/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/alien/tes)
